questions.neutral: Is the whole city running hot today?

hobby.message: Still flying like no one's watching?
Got a new origami fold in your pocket?

wrong_hobby_answer: That's not me - In free time, I fly FPV drones. It's a way to escape the noise of the city.
neutral_answer: Yeah, the pulse of the city feels off today.
Strange days are becoming usual.
I'm just trying to fly under the radar.
Keeping things tight, you know?
Even my drone flights are getting clipped.
Industrial zones, where no one cares, is my escape.
Feels like the city's on edge today.
Things aren't as smooth as they used to be.
Flying my drones helps me disengage.
But even that got tricky recently.
Off-grid spots are becoming restricted.
It's safer to stick to shadows.
City's buzzing a bit more than usual today.
Luckily, I took my drones for a flight earlier.
It's a good stress relief in these chaotic times.
Off in the industrial zones, you get real freedom.
Recent disruptions make things tense, though.
Flying clears the mind better than anything else.
City's a bit uneasy today, you could say.
I was out flying my drones before coming here.
It's become my way to cope with this unstable world.
Industrial zones are like my open sky.
Some strange interference has been messing with flights recently.
Still, there's no better feeling than when your mind clears mid-flight.
The city's been restless today, if you ask me.
I flew my drones around earlier to clear my head.
Drones give me this sense of clarity amidst all this chaos.
Industrial zones are my go-to spots — they let me breathe.
Lately, the disruptions have even started interfering with my flying.
It's all been more unsettling since my brother disappeared.
hobby_answer: Yeah, did some upgrades.
Kept the tune tight, nothing too fancy.

Less places to fly now, been tricky.
Keeping it quiet, you know how it is.
Added some range, helps a bit.
Still flies smooth, despite the issues.
System glitches making locations scarce.
Gotta be cautious with practice spots.
Keeping under radar, safer that way.
Tweaked the range for better control.
Disruptions have been challenging the usual spots.
Weathering these system quirks with practice.
Maintaining sync, keeping things steady.
Things are slower, but I adapt.
Extended the range, more control now.
Disruptions, constant adjustments needed.
System's been acting up, causing some hiccups.
Lost a couple of good spots to interference.
I go where it's clear, adapt accordingly.
Upgraded range, smooth now.
System disruptions made things tricky, even for flying.
Can't rely on usual spots, have to scout new ones.
Much like the city, unpredictable times.
Feels like I'm in a dance with the city's quirks.
